response.original_title: Cycling Changed My Life: Hayley Simmonds
response.overview: Hayley Simmonds found herself at a difficult crossroads in her life after three years studying science and rowing at Cambridge, but in a fortunate twist of fate started cycling. Subsequently she has raced her way to National titles, Commonwealth medals and has the Olympics in her sights. GCN follows Hayleyâ€™s training, meets the team of people behind her success and watches as she attempts to break her own record and become the first female to complete a 10 mile time trial in under 19 minutes.
response.title: Cycling Changed My Life: Hayley Simmonds
